name: Paunch 2
description:
All action takes place around grains - containers of life, freely moved by characters in the arena and used for throwing and spawning. We start with 12 players, who must compete by knocking out the rest to gain points from each hit. Eventually, there will be only one grain left. The player who picked it up will be the winner and takes the points earned.



5 new characters have joined Bob: Iva, Lev, Asher, Tori and Leon. All have individual poses, emotions, headgears and cloth patterns.

Technically magic:
- dozens procedurally generated islands
- muscle based movement, social and environment interaction
- procedural picking up and throwing mechanic
- emotional interactions
